title: Ice Man Cometh
description:
Mina and Patrick Claybon of the NFL Network discuss the latest moves in what has already been the most dramatic off-season ever: the Colts getting an upgrade at QB with Matt Ryan, the landing spots for Baker Mayfield and Jimmy Garoppolo, and Davante Adams going to Las Vegas. Plus, the Browns' "comprehensive evaluation process" regarding Deshaun Watson.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
